name: The damned leggings of Lucifer
data: It increases the users strength impressively.
It increases the users dexterity poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has superb armour class for its type (poor in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration pathetically.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'strike mighty blow'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'overhead swing'.
